archimate:Requirement.name: SA.1.4.4b: b) special factors that may influence the choice of access control mechanism (e.g. vendor preference, system capability, integration with physical security or regulatory pressures).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
